FullText:
Devil, Baal

This diabolical-looking golden-skinned humanoid towers over you, dressed in battered bronze chainmail. It wields a large morningstar in its clawed hand as it stares at you. Its bovine head features large round eyes of black, a large nose, wolf-like upright ears, and a large mouth lined with razor-sharp teeth. Tiny forward-curving horns protrude from its forehead.



Baal

CR 22

XP 615,000
LE Large outsider (devil, evil, extraplanar, lawful)
Init +11; Senses darkvision 60 ft., detect good, detect magic, see invisibility, see in darkness; Perception +37
Aura fear (20 ft., Will DC 29)
DEFENSE
AC 38, touch 19, flat-footed 36 (+9 armor, +2 Dex, +10 natural, -1 size, +8 profane)
hp 333 (23d10+207); regeneration 10 (good, silver)
Fort +16, Ref +20, Will +22
DR 15/good and silver; Immune fire, poison; Resist acid 10, cold 10; SR 33
OFFENSE
Spd 30 ft. (40 ft. base)
Melee +4 unholy morningstar +40/+35/+30/+25 (2d6+17/19-20)
Space 10 ft.; Reach 10 ft. (20 ft. with morningstar)
Spell-Like Abilities (CL 20th)
Constant—comprehend languages, detect good, detect magic, see invisibility
At Will—animate dead, blasphemy (DC 25), charm monster (DC 22), disguise self, greater dispel magic, greater invisibility (DC 22), greater teleport (self plus 50 pounds of objects only), inflict serious wounds (DC 21), magic circle against good, produce flame, pyrotechnics (DC 20), suggestion (DC 21), tongues, unhallow (DC 23), unholy aura (DC 26), wall of fire, wind walk
2/day—shapechange, summon (level 9, 4d10 lemures or nupperibos, 2d4 barbed devils, bearded devils, or gorgons, 1d4 erinyes, or 1 ghaddar devil, horned devil, or pit fiend 100%)
1/day—fire storm (DC 26), symbol of stunning (DC 25)
STATISTICS
Str 37, Dex 25, Con 29, Int 25, Wis 25, Cha 27
Base Atk +23; CMB +37; CMD 62
Feats Alertness, Blind-Fight, Cleave, Great Cleave, Improved Critical (morningstar), Improved Initiative, Improved Sunder, Improved Vital Strike, Iron Will, Power Attack, Vital Strike, Weapon Focus (morningstar)
Skills Bluff +34, Diplomacy +34, Disguise +34, Escape Artist +26, Fly +24, Intimidate +34, Knowledge (arcana) +30, Knowledge (planes) +33, Knowledge (religion) +33, Perception +37, Sense Motive +37, Stealth +25, Survival +30
Languages Abyssal, Celestial, Common, Daemonic,
Combat Gear Sheol, +3 chainmail
ECOLOGY
Environment any (Hell)
Organization solitary or troupe (Baal plus 2-5 horned devils or 2-4 barbed devils)
Treasure double standard Sheol: Baal's unique weapon is a Large +4 unholy morningstar. As a free action, the handle of Baal's morningstar can extend 10 feet, thus increasing his reach with this weapon. It can likewise retract to its normal length as a free action.


Baal is a duke in the employ of Great Mammon and leads 5 legions of barbed devils in his service. Baal follows Lord Mammon's orders without question but secretly plans one day to wrest the throne from his master (who has become complacent as of late). For now, though, he waits and schemes.

Baal stands 8 feet tall and weighs 500 pounds.
